articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: Li Keqiang, a Communist Chinese leader with a 'human face' - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Former premier's death leaves Beijing watchers wondering what might have been
articles.content:
HONG KONG -- In late 2014, less than two years into his job as China's premier, Li Keqiang flew to Bangkok to attend a summit on regional economic cooperation.
As an editor stationed there at the ti… [+182 chars]
